website_summaries.verdict: An attractive alternative to pricier toilets offered by "bigger" names. The right-hand flush design is more of a novelty, but some customers do seek them out, and this is a good one.
pros: Powerful flushing action thanks to larger-than-average flush valve and completely glazed drain pipe
Lightweight, low-flow, and easy to install
cons: The round bowl design and low seat height may not satisfy taller adults
Right-hand flush requires a shift in thinking

customer_reviews.title: Clean Toilet Bowl
customer_reviews.text: The toilet functions well, particularly because the special ceramic finish is very non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Finish not complete
customer_reviews.text: If you zoom in, the porcelain is not finished. My husband put in for a return. I received a response from Amazon that they sent the information for return to the seller on the 11th, today is the 18th I haven’t heard anything from the seller about getting this toilet returned. I’m very disappointed about this. I would like to have a toilet to use in this bathroom. ... About the toilet, minus the porcelain finish, it really seems to flush exceptionally well. I understand that there are defects in items on occasion but truly, how long do you have to wait for a response?
customer_reviews.author: jeanj

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by a plumber...
customer_reviews.text: This toilet has a comfort height, saves water, and looks attractive (as attractive as a toilet can get). I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toilets through Amazon, who would have thought....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toilet to replace on of four in my house. This was about 4 months ago. I did the job myself and it was fairly simple. I also used a wax-less seal because I did not want to deal with wax. After 4 months, this toilet is doing great. it is an eco-friendly version and uses less water than the normal ones which is a plus. I am going to replace the other three in the house with the same model as this over the next 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Craig T.

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: The obvious. It is great, A little too high connection to the floor. Will need to find some way to stabilize as it wobbles, especially if in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Conway

customer_reviews.title: The Best Residential Toilet I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Just like the title says, it's the best I've ever used. This thing doesn't clog and uses a small volume of water compared with the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Uses half the water as our old Kohler with twice the flushing power. With a house of 4 big boys that’s a wonderful thing to have. Zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcmurray

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: each flush can clean everything. It is must better than my one toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: I never knew it was so hard to fund a right hand flushing toilet. You learn something new everyday. Amazon came through for me ion this one. We passed our inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Hausmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet. Just did not realize the handle was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Just did not realize the handle was for left handed people.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Snow

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean
customer_reviews.text: Got talked into one of these Toto toilets by a salesman. After using the toilet with the little stream of water around the inside rim, we discovered that it was not enough to keep the inside of the toilet clean. It is still in our rental house. Moved to a new house with a wateridge toilet that is absolutely fabulous, only to learn that Costco doesn’t carry it anymore. What to do in the future, we don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Myers

product_meta.title: TOTO CST743ER#01 Eco#Drake Round Bowl Toilet with Right Hand Tank C743E + St743Er, Cotton White
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
TOTO C743E-01 This is a combination of Bowl along with ST743ER-01 Tank and SS113-01 Seat. Drake Round 2-Piece Toilet CST743ER: ECO DRAKE(r) TOILET - 1.28 GPF Close coupled commercial grade, high performance toilet. Round front bowl and tank set, less seat. Chrome trip lever. E-Max flushing system Five year limited warranty. 12-Inch rough-in, less supply with right trip lever. With unrivaled vision and innovation expertise, TOTO leads and never follows in designing, engineering, refining and delivering innovative technology that enhances your daily life. TOTO's innovations translate into the best performance and ecology in the plumbing world. TOTO leaves nothing to chance when it comes to design. TOTO embraces holistic design principles because performance, quality, functionality and ultimately, customer satisfaction, are just as important as aesthetics. Backed by precision engineering and global manufacturing, great designs address functionality and performance as well as beauty. Attention to detail, continuous improvement, over a thousand research and development professionals and 90+ years of experience fuel TOTO's product quality. TOTO provides unmatched performance, durability and reliability, representing the ultimate in customer satisfaction for our toilets, faucets, lavatories, showers and products for the entire bathroom. Superior quality backed by over 90 years of experience creates many benefits. TOTO installations offer peace of mind and performance you can count on. Reliability translates into reduced maintenance costs and superior performance.
